question.title: Will the European Union expand its membership to include at least one new country before January 1, 2028?

question.title: Will Ukraine's GDP grow by at least 20% from its 2023 level by January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if, between October 1, 2024 and January 1, 2028, Ukraine's Gross Domestic Product (GDP) grows by at least 20% from its 2023 level. The GDP data should be sourced from the World Bank or International Monetary Fund (IMF).

para_P.title: Is it expected that Ukraine's GDP will increase by a minimum of 20% compared to its 2023 figure by January 1, 2028?

question.title: Will either of the following occur by January 1, 2028: (a) The European Union expands its membership to include at least one new country, or (b) Ukraine's GDP grows by at least 20% from its 2023 level?
question.body:
(a) The European Union will be considered to have expanded its membership if, between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, it officially includes at least one new country, confirmed by the European Council and published in the Official Journal of the European Union.
(b) Ukraine's GDP will be considered to have grown by at least 20% if, between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, it increases by at least 20% from its 2023 level, with data sourced from the World Bank or International Monetary Fund (IMF).

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur by January 1, 2028: (a) The European Union expands its membership to include at least one new country, nor (b) Ukraine's GDP grows by at least 20% from its 2023 level?

(b) Ukraine's GDP will not be considered to have grown by at least 20% if, between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, it does not increase by at least 20% from its 2023 level, with data sourced from the World Bank or International Monetary Fund (IMF).

para_P.title: Is it possible that by January 1, 2028, one of the following will take place: (a) The European Union adds at least one new member country, or (b) Ukraine experiences a GDP increase of 20% or more compared to its 2023 figures?
para_P.body:
(a) The European Union will be deemed to have added to its membership if, within the timeframe from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028, it officially incorporates at least one new nation, as confirmed by the European Council and published in the Official Journal of the European Union.
(b) Ukraine's GDP will be regarded as having increased by at least 20% if, in the period between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028, it rises by a minimum of 20% from its 2023 level, with data obtained from the World Bank or International Monetary Fund (IMF).

not_P.title: Will Taiwan not officially adopt an AI ethics framework based on philosophical principles before January 1, 2028?
not_P.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if, between October 1, 2024 and January 1, 2028, Taiwan does not officially adopt an AI ethics framework that explicitly references philosophical principles. The lack of adoption must be confirmed through official government documentation or announcements.

para_P.title: Will Taiwan implement an AI ethics framework grounded in philosophical concepts prior to January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if, within the period from October 1, 2024 to January 1, 2028, Taiwan formally establishes an AI ethics framework that specifically cites philosophical concepts. The establishment must be validated by official government records or statements.

question.title: Will the US Supreme Court rule on an energy policy case before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if the US Supreme Court issues a ruling on a case concerning energy policy at any point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The ruling must be documented in the official records of the Supreme Court.

not_P.title: Will the US Supreme Court not rule on an energy policy case before January 1, 2028?
not_P.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if the US Supreme Court does not issue a ruling on a case concerning energy policy at any point between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028. The ruling must be documented in the official records of the Supreme Court.

para_P.title: Will the US Supreme Court make a decision regarding an energy policy case prior to January 1, 2028?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if the US Supreme Court delivers a judgment on a case related to energy policy at any time from October 1, 2024, to January 1, 2028. The decision must be recorded in the Supreme Court's official documentation.

question.title: Will either of the following occur before January 1, 2028: (1) Taiwan officially adopts an AI ethics framework based on philosophical principles, or (2) The US Supreme Court rules on an energy policy case?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if either of the following events occur between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028: (1) Taiwan officially adopts an AI ethics framework that explicitly references philosophical principles, confirmed through official government documentation or announcements, or (2) The US Supreme Court issues a ruling on a case concerning energy policy, documented in the official records of the Supreme Court.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur before January 1, 2028: (1) Taiwan officially adopts an AI ethics framework based on philosophical principles, nor (2) The US Supreme Court rules on an energy policy case?
not_P.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if neither of the following events occur between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028: (1) Taiwan officially adopts an AI ethics framework that explicitly references philosophical principles, confirmed through official government documentation or announcements, or (2) The US Supreme Court issues a ruling on a case concerning energy policy, documented in the official records of the Supreme Court.

para_P.title: Is it possible that one of the following events takes place prior to January 1, 2028: (1) Taiwan formally implements an AI ethics framework grounded in philosophical principles, or (2) The US Supreme Court makes a decision regarding an energy policy case?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with 'Yes' if either of the subsequent occurrences happens between October 1, 2024, and January 1, 2028: (1) Taiwan formally adopts an AI ethics framework that specifically cites philosophical principles, as verified by official government documentation or announcements, or (2) The US Supreme Court delivers a ruling on a case related to energy policy, as recorded in the official documentation of the Supreme Court.
